mms.view

Interface IAbstractView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractView, AdminFilmView, AdminStatsView, CreditsView, CustomerStatsView, DetailsFilmView, EditableCardView, EditableDiscountView, EditableFilmView, EditablePersonView, EditableReviewView, EditableShopView, FavoriteFilmView, FeedbackView, FilmListView, LoginView, ManageCopyFilmView, ManageCustomerView, ManageShopView, ManageSocietyView, MenuView, ReviewView, SocietyFilmView

    public interface IAbstractView
extends java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Interface that extends interface of the listener for the views.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
